item.title: Kibeth Codes twitch highlights 1
item.description: To practise for live speaking and to explore how to add Jetpack Compose to an existing open source app, I start a twitch stream as kibethcodes. The app I chose to work on is Habitica, a habit tracking/ToDo app that saw it’s first commit in 2015. KibethCodes level 6 Streaming Tuesdays at 19:00 UTC+2 Here are a selection of highlights of the twitch stream.
